channel.title: Scar autofighter help :s
channel.description: Anyone have any idea what colour i should use for a chicken? im trying to fight chickens auto, if i pick white it usually clicks on flowers -.-

item.title: Scar autofighter help :s
item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

Well every since the new game engive the colors change a lot.
You shoudl just let the user chose a color.
Or get a the white of the chicken and add a tolerance and do something like this.

[scar]Procedure AutoChickenCOlor;
begin;
If Findcolorspiral(x,y,CHICKENCOLOR,1,1,500,750) then
MMouse(x,y,1,1)
If IsUpText(‘Attack’)
Then (GetColor(x,y)=Chicken)
end;

Procedure Attack;
Begin
If Findcolorspiral(x,y,Chicken,1,1,500,750) then
Mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
end;[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Scar autofighter help :s

item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

The red on its head?
Or its feet.

Just find a unique color, where no near object recreates.
